1.0.name: wordpress/wp-syntax-effects
1.0.description:
Adds a simple mouseover-effect for WP-Syntax. Expands the "Sourcecode"-Frame to the sourcecode length. So it's not needed to scroll, if you have longer line. Check the Screenshots for more details.

Live Demo

http://www.it-gecko.de/mouseover-effekt-fuer-wp-syntax.html
